DIS - Design Italian Shoes, is a winning solution for those who want to stand out and express their personality designing and wearing classic customised shoes for men - 100% Made in Italy.
Scan your feet and customize your shoes on \n https://www.designitalianshoes.com/
To scan your feet you need:
A standard sheet of white paper (A4 or US letter) with no bends or wrinkles
A hard floor of a color that contrasts with your feet and twith the white sheet of paper
Sit down throughout the whole scanning process. Optionally ask someone to take photos
Select the size of the paper
Give a name to your scan (optional)
Give a name to your scan
Give a name to Your Scan
You are going to take 3 photos of the right foot.

Please sit down and place your foot on the sheet as shown in the picture and follow the instructions on the screen.

You are going to take 3 photos of the right foot.

Remember to stand comfortably, because you MUST NOT MOVE the right foot from photos 1 until you take photo 3.

Take a photo like the one you see above by following these tips.

Aim the camera at the inner side of your right foot.

Make sure that the four corners of the sheet of paper​are visible.

Make sure that the​heel is included in the image.

Take a photo like the one you see above by following these tips.

Rotate your phone in landscape mode and tilt it slightly outwards until the red and grey outlines merge and become green.

Make sure that the​four corners of the sheet of paper are visible.

Take a photo like the one you see above by following these tips.

Aim the camera at the outer side of your right foot.

Make sure that the four corners​ of the sheet of paper are visible.

Make sure that the heel is included in the image.
You are going to take 3 photos of the left foot.

Please, stay seated and place your foot on the sheet as shown in the picture and follow the instructions on the screen.
